name: Torrent sites fixed -updated and animated
description:
Torrent sites fixed -updated and animated
works on domains:  https://thepiratebay.org/, https://eztv-proxy.net, http://subscene.com/, https://eztv.ch/, https://idope.se, https://rarbg.to/, eztv-proxy.net, subscene.com, 1337x.to, fenopy.eu, seedpeer.eueztv.ag, bitport.ioboxopus.comextratorrent.cctoorgle.combitsnoop.comtorrentdownloads.meyourbittorrent.comtorrentfunk.comtorlock.comlimetorrents.cc ,monova.org, torrentdownloads.cc

user.name: Thorsten Obermayer
user.about:
Hacker for fun, interested in technology and visual art along with music.
I hope you enjoy my styles which are mostly mods of well known styles bugfixed and up to date.

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://thepiratebay.org/"), 
 url-prefix(https://eztv-proxy.net), url-prefix(http://subscene.com/), url-prefix(https://eztv.ch/), url-prefix(https://idope.se), url-prefix(https://rarbg.to/), domain(eztv-proxy.net), domain(subscene.com), domain(1337x.to), domain(fenopy.eu), domain(seedpeer.eu),domain(eztv.ag), domain(bitport.io),domain(boxopus.com),domain(extratorrent.cc),domain(toorgle.com),domain(bitsnoop.com),domain(torrentdownloads.me),domain(yourbittorrent.com),domain(torrentfunk.com),domain(torlock.com),domain(limetorrents.cc),domain(monova.org),domain(torrentdownloads.cc) {
* {
    color: white !important;
    background: black !important;
    background-color: black !important;
     background:url(https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7TKD2NSys6ZPL6Cs/source.gif)#000 fixed!important;background-size:cover!important
}
a:link {
    color: white !important
}
a:visited {
    color: gray !important
}
a:hover {
    color: white !important
}
a:active {
    color: white !important
}
